articles.title: World rushes to negotiating table as Trump tariffs shake world markets - France 24
articles.description: As Donald Trump's comprehensive tariffs forced drastic losses throughout Asian markets on Monday, countries around the world, including Washington's allies, scrambled to quell the turbulence caused by the president amid worsening fears of an upcoming global t…
articles.content: Asian markets took a huge plunge Monday as US futures pointed to significant losses on Wall Street over Donald Trump's punishing tariffs, even as countries sought compromise with the defiant presiden… [+5084 chars]
